subject: BARRISTER JEAN S. AKE
body:
[cid:3f4a213c-55b0-4486-8a61-b838912dec11]
Hello Sandy,

I got your contact from Dr. Max Williams, I am Barrister Jean S. Ake the financial adviser to Ambassador Jeannot Ahoussou-Kouadio, Dr. Maxwell Williams is a good friend of mine and I hinted him of my politician client from Ivory Coast that mandated me to look for a reliable and trustworthy person that can invest his funds valued 75 million US dollars into any lucrative business on his behalf for the period of 10 years.

Here is the details of the transaction , my client Jeannot Ahoussou-Kouadio is an Ivorian politician who was Prime Minister of Ivory Coast from March 2012 to November 2012. In 2018, he was appointed president of the Senate, he has Seventy Five Million United States Dollar Deposited in an ESCROW ACCOUNT of the BANK OF AFRICA (BOA BENIN) he need a reliable and trustworthy person that can invest the said FUND into any lucrative business anywhere in the world for the period of 10 years, presently my client is under investigation because of this FUND, therefore he want the said FUND transfer out of the Bank of Africa Benin immediately for onward investment.

My client has agreed unconditionally and irrevocably to compensate the Fund Manager with a commission of 10% of the principal Fund for acceptance, Sir, you as the FUND MANAGER can invest the FUND on your area of specialization

Note that my client doesn’t want his name to be mentioned in this transaction because of the situations on ground and his personality

Upon your acceptance to invest the FUND on behalf of my client get back to me with the following details

1, Name and address (2) Company name and address (3) Copy of your Identity “passport or National ID card” these information are require for me to prepare the CONTRACT AGREEMENT (MEMORANDUM OF UNDERSTANDING) between the two parties in case of any breach of contract.
Regards
Barrister Jean S. AKE
+229 91 28 04 68

subject: Re: BARRISTER JEAN S. AKE
body:
Hello Barrister Jean S. AKE,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this opportunity. I appreciate Dr. Max Williams for recommending me as a potential investor for your client's funds. Investing in a lucrative business sounds interesting.

Could you please provide more details about the nature of the business and the expected returns? Additionally, what is the timeline for this investment? I would like to have a clear understanding before proceeding further.

Regarding the required documents, why do you need a copy of my identity passport or national ID card? Is there any specific reason for this?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Sandy

subject: Re: BARRISTER JEAN S. AKE
body:
[https://attachment.outlook.live.net/owa/jeanake677@outlook.com/service.svc/s/GetAttachmentThumbnail?id=AQMkADAwATM0MDAAMS1mYmIAMi1jMTlkLTAwAi0wMAoARgAAA12mp0X0XotLkOsnfZ5M49sHAJW37p1mDwNPhK0YESZgSW4AAAIBCQAAAJW37p1mDwNPhK0YESZgSW4ABuHHUOYAAAABEgAQAHOWdjs5h8dEtCPcjPa2eew%3D&thumbnailType=2&owa=outlook.live.com&isc=1&X-OWA-CANARY=UjXgy-scnUuHyKVc35bOKtCaUzeHKtwYF9f726gN0ZNjUXNrDdDQHfqJrJ8os5XG0sWVzL6Ioow.&token=eyJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsImtpZCI6IkU1RDJGMEY4REE5M0I2NzA5QzQzQTlFOEE2MTQzQzAzRDYyRjlBODAiLCJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJ4NXQiOiI1ZEx3LU5xVHRuQ2NRNm5vcGhROEE5WXZtb0EifQ..XBo0DQchP4yKkTJeqLgipwRqbz-JMCM3BR4kd_Mx62cgb9gNJjW_XhTUx1y1kFv1gkmrkPrDtrEaG8L0sr05y7vCiuUKTqM0VyFGw_XAc68AzpE1qCo1LvhVKOCx5bWUfibpqcnd0-hinSwWSfiGd-SAsyieF5dt3G-WvUArjpCFUfMnifBf30Y9VqOPbtxV03VTB2MTqclXCcnjau5aw0ytCQE099xpyLN1k3kZ54HQUXlw8xR5hjq9j0jrpyFrRZaQz-px403i7QEFy0xisLaQ_MZzF4gRhZrKGTbe3JHiC3ipIV2hRh_wHHiXLyrPSQURuyE6OJCzBvGc2AQW-Q&animation=true]
Hello Sandy,

Thanks for your swift response, to answer your questions, the timeframe for the investment is 10 years and can be extended, you are free to invest on your area of specialization.

Regarding to the required information (copy of your identity) is going to be used in preparing the Memorandum of understanding (MOU) otherwise known as agreement that will bind both parties from any breach of contract.

Looking forward to your response
Regards
Barrister Jean AKE

subject: Re: BARRISTER JEAN S. AKE
body:
Hello Barrister Jean AKE,
Thank you for getting back to me so quickly. I appreciate your willingness to answer my questions. Investing for a longer timeframe sounds interesting. Can you provide more details about the potential returns on this investment? Also, could you explain what the Memorandum of MOU entails and how it protects both parties involved?
Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Sandy
